perc_hh_with_cable_fiber_dsl.short_name: Households with cable, fiber optic, or DSL
perc_hh_with_cable_fiber_dsl.long_name: Percentage of households with a high speed internet service (cable, fiber optic, or DSL)
perc_hh_with_cable_fiber_dsl.short_description: Percentage of households self-reported to have a high speed internet service (cable, fiber optic, or DSL)
perc_hh_with_cable_fiber_dsl.long_description: Percentage of households self-reported to have a high speed internet service. A high speed internet service is defined as a cable, fiber optic, or DSL internet connection. Based on American Community Survey Table B28002 in ACS 2015/2019 5-year estimates.
perc_hh_with_cable_fiber_dsl.statement: {value} of households in {features.name} have a cable, fiber optic, or DSL internet connection.
